title: Deep Sea Generic for Ocean Nasal Moisturizing Spray 1.5 oz (44ML) 3 PACK Total 4.5 oz by Major Pharmaceuticals
features: NASAL SPRAY: To help relieve congestion by thinning mucus; To moisturize and irrigate membranes
FEATURES: Liquid formula for nasal dryness
MOISTURIZING: Help return moisture caused by drug-induced dryness while spending time in enclosed spaces such as during air travel
FAST-RELIEF: To relieve dryness associated with oxygen treatments and CPAP machines
SAFE FOR DAILY USE: For general moisturizing in dry, cold climates
description: Deep Sea Generic for Ocean Nasal Moisturizing Spray 1.5 oz (44ML) 3 PACK Total 4.5 oz by Major Pharmaceuticals - Eliminate the feeling of dryness and restore moisture to your nose to breathe easier and remain comfortable with Major Deep Sea Premium Saline. The non-medicated generic Ocean saline nasal spray contains the preservatives saline sodium chloride and benzalkonium chloride and is safe for daily use. It's also effective at reducing nose dryness caused by air travel, prescribed medications, and oxygen treatments. Simply squeeze this moisturizing nasal spray twice in each nostril as needed. Spray it upright to deliver a spray, horizontally to create a stream, and upside down to place a single drop into your nose.
